descriptionNullable:
This dataset comprises over 10,000 news articles, each annotated with both its news type and sentiment. The dataset covers a diverse range of topics and news categories, making it a valuable resource for various natural language processing (NLP) and machine learning tasks.

Features:

News Headlines: The complete text of each news article is included, allowing for detailed analysis of the content.
News Type: The type or category of each news article is labeled, providing insights into the diverse subjects covered in the dataset.
NewsEffect: Each news article is labeled with its sentiment, indicating whether the content expresses a positive, negative, informative, or neutral sentiment.

Potential Use Cases:
Sentiment Analysis: Use the sentiment labels to build models that can automatically classify the sentiment of news articles.
Text Classification: Leverage the news type labels to train models for text classification tasks based on the diverse range of topics.
Content Analysis: Explore the dataset to understand trends, patterns, and insights within different news categories.
Dataset Format:

CSV (Comma-Separated Values)
Columns:

News Headlines: The complete text content of the tweet news.
News Type: Categorical label indicating the type or category of the news.
News Effect: Sentiment label (Positive, Negative, Informative, Neutral) associated with each news.
title: X-News Dataset
